data.actual_result: It shows a black screen for other people in the call and they cannot hear audio.
data.expected_result: Your friends should be able to see your screen and hear audio
data.short_description: Im trying to stream a game through discord but it is a black screen and will not share audio.
data.steps_to_repro: - First you launch a game - Now go to discord a click "stream" and then the name of the game- next it will be black screen for friends and they will not be bale to hear audio.
